about_the_game:
Important:

• If you already have the Type 62 in your Garage, you will receive 2,500 gold as compensation.
• If you already have the Firebreather Legendary camouflage, you will receive 950 gold as compensation.

This bundle includes:

• Type 62 Premium tank (China, light, Tier VII)
• Garage slot
• 9 equipment slots
• Firebreather Legendary camouflage for the Type 62
• D-2 Model 1926 AA Mount attachment
• 10 Rare Combat XP boosters
• 10 Rare Free XP boosters

The Type 62 is a light tank of many talents. It can scout, capture bases, and even take a good chunk out of an enemy's HP along the way. Despite being fired at from all kinds of guns, it's not an easy target to hit.

This DLC bundle can only be added to your World of Tanks Blitz account once.
